comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111019 Firefox/10.0a1
Build ID: 20111019031031




Expected results:

After bug 671553 was fixed, icons and buttons had white color on Aero. This behavior should also apply to bookmarks toolbar text on Aero. (This issue does not happen with dark personas)
